trans-unit.source: Retrieves the security identifier (SID) for an account

seg-source.mrk: Retrieves the security identifier (SID) for an account

target.mrk: Retrieves the security identifier (SID) for an account

trans-unit.source: Use a fully qualified string in the domain_name\user_name format to ensure that the function finds the account in the desired domain.

seg-source.mrk: Use a fully qualified string in the domain_name\user_name format to ensure that the function finds the account in the desired domain.

target.mrk: Use a fully qualified string in the domain_name\user_name format to ensure that the function finds the account in the desired domain.

trans-unit.source: [optional] Name of the system. This string can be the name of a remote computer.

seg-source.mrk: This string can be the name of a remote computer.

target.mrk: This string can be the name of a remote computer.

trans-unit.source: If this string is blank, the account name translation begins on the local system.

seg-source.mrk: If this string is blank, the account name translation begins on the local system.

target.mrk: If this string is blank, the account name translation begins on the local system.

trans-unit.source: If the name cannot be resolved on the local system, this function will try to resolve the name using domain controllers trusted by the local system.

seg-source.mrk: If the name cannot be resolved on the local system, this function will try to resolve the name using domain controllers trusted by the local system.

target.mrk: If the name cannot be resolved on the local system, this function will try to resolve the name using domain controllers trusted by the local system.

trans-unit.source: a binary SID in a byte structure.

seg-source.mrk: a binary SID in a byte structure.

target.mrk: a binary SID in a byte structure.

trans-unit.source: $tSID is structure filled with SID data for spesified account

seg-source.mrk: $tSID is structure filled with SID data for spesified account

target.mrk: $tSID is structure filled with SID data for spesified account
